page.title: 19Keswick's Leisure Complex
page.content: The Keswick Swimming pool will hopefully be built for 1987. We are waiting for permission from Allerdale District council. They have to sort out all the details. They are waiting for someone to put in a price for building it. The station belongs to Lake District planning board and Allerdale District Council also. The special Town Council is also involved. The station site was available because it is a very suitable place.Inside the leisure complex there is going to be a lagoon shaped swimming pool.Also a squash site and a sauna .It will have a theatre complex and conference centre .In the swimming pool there maybe be a wave machine and a beach. There will be a coffee bar,snack bar and a restaurant.
